meta.concept: Traders cluster orders at round numbers - creates support/resistance

major_levels.trading_notes: Often multiple tests before break, high volume at these levels

minor_levels.trading_notes: Significant but weaker than major levels

quarter_levels.trading_notes: Moderate reaction, some traders use these

magnet_effect.description: Price tends to gravitate toward round numbers
magnet_effect.behavior: Price often pauses or reverses at these levels
magnet_effect.use_case: Target round numbers for profit taking

clean_break.description: Strong momentum breaks through with volume

false_break.identification: Long wick through level, close back inside
false_break.trading: Fade false breaks - high win rate

rejection.description: Price approaches but doesn't touch, reverses

near_level.note: Price drawn to complete the number

bounce_major_level.entry: Limit order 2-3 points before level or candle close rejection
bounce_major_level.target: Previous swing or next round number
bounce_major_level.best_context: Trend intact, level aligned with support

breakout_major_level.entry: Close beyond level with volume, or retest entry
breakout_major_level.note: Wait for retest for better R:R

fade_false_break.setup: Price spikes through level, immediately reverses
fade_false_break.entry: When price closes back inside level
fade_false_break.note: High win rate setup - stop hunt reversal

range_between_levels.setup: Price ranging between two round numbers
range_between_levels.strategy: Sell near top of range, buy near bottom

round_number_plus_fib.example: 2618 is both round $10 level AND 0.618 fib

round_number_plus_previous_day.example: 2700 is major level AND previous day high

asia.note: Range often bounded by round numbers

london.note: Initial move may test round numbers

ny_overlap.note: High volume can break through levels

time_of_day_patterns.ny_open: Can break major levels with momentum
time_of_day_patterns.end_of_day: Often gravitates to round numbers for close
